docs.snippet: A rule that allows some graduating college players to transfer and play without sitting out for a year is great for midmajor players seeking the big time — and tough on the programs they leave....
docs.lead_paragraph: A rule that allows some graduating college players to transfer and play without sitting out for a year is great for midmajor players seeking the big time — and tough on the programs they leave.
docs.abstract: William C Rhoden Sports of the Times column points to University of Arizona men's basketball team forward Mark Tollefsen, who transferred from University of San Francsico, as example of flexibility available to players who retain eligibility after graduation.

headline.main: Graduates Pursue a Fondest Wish Without Waiting
headline.print_headline: Graduates Pursue a Fondest Wish Without Waiting

docs.snippet: Shinji Okazaki scored with a spectacular overhead kick as Leicester City overcame Rafa Benitez's Newcastle United 1-0 to restore a five-point lead at the top of the Premier League on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Shinji Okazaki scored with a spectacular overhead kick as Leicester City overcame Rafa Benitez's Newcastle United 1-0 to restore a five-point lead at the top of the Premier League on Monday.

docs.snippet: Less than six months after resigning as chief executive of the WTA Tour, Stacy Allaster is joining the United States Tennis Association as its chief executive for professional tennis....
docs.lead_paragraph: Less than six months after resigning as chief executive of the WTA Tour, Stacy Allaster is joining the United States Tennis Association as its chief executive for professional tennis.
docs.abstract: United States Tennis Assn announces Stacey Allaster will assume new position of chief executive for professional tennis, almost six months after she unexpectedly resigned as chief executive of WTA Tour.

headline.main: Stacey Allaster, Former WTA Leader, Returns to the Game, With the U.S.T.A.
headline.print_headline: Rejuvenated, Former WTA Leader Returns to the Game, With the U.S.T.A.
